metadata.title: CVE-2015-7553 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Race condition in the kernel in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7, kernel-rt andRed Hat Enterprise MRG 2, when the nfnetlink_log module is loaded, allowslocal users to cause a denial of service (panic) by creating netlinksockets.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
